msItem.title: Raj Dashini or Tawarikh-i Jammun,
msItem.note: F1a: signature of Ellis, dated 11.4.12. Folio after text, recto: signature of E. Denison Ross. 3 folios preceding text have a pencilled list of contents in Persian. A history of the Rajahs of Jammu up to 1847.
msItem.incipit: Ba'd-i hamd-i padishahi kih tawarikh-i u-ra

origin.p: In the exalted Jangi Daftar of Jammu. 14 Tankah? 1911 Samvat, after the fifth ghari of the night.

acquisition.p: Provenance: Presumably same as other Ellis manuscripts.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
